modName: Diems Fork of Power with Machine Gun Staff
summary: Adds a powerful FORK weapon and a machinegun staff. Enjoy!
descriptionHtml:
Hehehe, this is a fun mod :D

__________________________
Description:
__________________________
Adds a fork of power to the game, which is actually a very powerful dagger, the most powerful in the game in fact. This mod also adds a staff that is a machine gun. It looks like a staff, but it shoots ice spikes a a rate of two spikes per second, dealing 200 dps, pretty good, plus it has range and infinit charge. To make these awesome weapons, you need the Daedric Smithing perk (tried to balance it out a little bit). They can be crafted at any regular forge and they are under the misc section. They are labeled how you would think they would be labeled, Fork of power and Machinegun Staff. 

__________________________
WHY??!?!?!?!!?!?:
__________________________
To answer this question that I am SURE most of you are thinking, because I decided to (I\'m kind of acting like Sheogorath right now). My brother wanted a fully automatic ice spike spell, I wanted an almost 1 hit TKO fork, and this is the product of our ideas.

__________________________
Credits:
__________________________
G-d for creating us
Bethesda for GOTY Skyrim
SkyEdit team for SkyEdit, an amazing tool for pre CK modders
Me for making this
My brother for giving me this idea
SkyrimNexus for this awsome site
The modding community for downloading my mods :D
Irrissann for the fork launcher idea!

Check out my other mods!
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7273]Diems Giant Club[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2647]Diems Compilation of Cheats[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7864]Diems Realistic Weapon Weights[/url]
author: DiemCarpe
